message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Is that something we could work with?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $1750000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. Is that something we could work with?
I understand your desire to get closer to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go that low. I'll offer you a compromise: I'll sell the product to you for $1700000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than my target. Would you be willing to meet me at $1650000?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $1680000.
I've thought about it, and I'm willing to go up to $1650000. This is my final offer. Will you accept it?
